name: argueview-js
description: ArgueView is a tool for generating text-based presentations for machine-learning predictions and feature-importance based explanation tools. The tool makes use of Toulmin's model of argumentation for structuring the text-based explanations. This javascript contains visualization components that can be used to render explanations generated by the Python counterpart of ArgueView.

scripts.build: sh build/prebuild.sh && webpack --config build/webpack.dev.js && webpack --config build/webpack.prod.js && tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist/typings && npm run copy
scripts.copy: if test -d test/argueview; then rm test/argueview/dist -r; fi && if test -d test/argueview-test-app/node_modules/argueview; then rm test/argueview-test-app/node_modules/argueview -r; fi && mkdir -p test/argueview && cp dist test/argueview/dist -r && cp package.json test/argueview/package.json && cp package-lock.json test/argueview/package-lock.json && cd test/argueview-test-app && npm i
